address: 15 Adeola Odeku Street, Victoria Island, Lagos
description: Exquisite 4-bedroom detached house in the heart of Victoria Island. Features include a fully fitted kitchen, en-suite rooms, ample parking, and a swimming pool. Ideal for a high-end family residence.

address: Flat 7, Sapphire Towers, Eko Atlantic, Lagos
description: Luxurious 3-bedroom apartment with breathtaking ocean views in Eko Atlantic. Comes with modern amenities, 24/7 power, security, and access to a gym and concierge service. Unbeatable urban living.

address: Plot 20, Lekki Phase 1 Scheme 2, Lekki, Lagos
description: Strategically located dry land in a serene and developing part of Lekki Phase 1. Perfect for residential development. Close to major road networks and essential facilities.
Spacious 5-bedroom semi-detached house in a prime Ikoyi location. Features include a servant's quarter, dedicated power supply, and a well-maintained garden. Ideal for a large family.

address: Block C, Millennium Estate, Gbagada, Lagos
description: Affordable 2-bedroom apartment in a secure and well-managed estate in Gbagada. Good road access, steady power, and proximity to major markets and schools. Excellent value.

address: Shop 12, Balogun Market, Lagos Island, Lagos
description: Prime commercial shop space in the bustling Balogun Market. High foot traffic, ideal for retail or wholesale business. Flexible lease terms available.
Grand 6-bedroom luxury mansion on the prestigious Bourdillon Road. Features a cinema room, private gym, landscaped gardens, and staff quarters. Unmatched elegance and security.

address: Unit 10A, The Horizon, Banana Island, Lagos
description: Exclusive 4-bedroom apartment in the highly sought-after Banana Island. Offers panoramic lagoon views, state-of-the-art facilities, and ultimate privacy. Comes with all white goods.

address: Farm Plot, Epe-Ijebu Expressway, Epe, Lagos
description: Expansive 5-acre plot suitable for agricultural or mixed-use development. Located on the rapidly developing Epe axis, offering great investment potential. Close to major future projects.
Fully serviced 1-bedroom apartment in a tranquil part of Ikeja GRA. Ideal for short-term stays or business travelers. Includes daily cleaning, internet, and 24-hour power.

address: Office Complex, Herbert Macaulay Way, Yaba, Lagos
description: Modern office complex for sale in the vibrant Yaba tech hub. Multiple units, ample parking, and excellent visibility. Perfect for tech companies or corporate headquarters.
Cozy 3-bedroom bungalow available for rent in the serene Magodo Phase 2 estate. Features a spacious compound, secure environment, and proximity to schools and malls.
Stunning beachfront 3-bedroom apartment with panoramic views of the Atlantic Ocean. Perfect for holiday homes or investment. Comes fully furnished with modern fittings.

address: Co-Working Hub, Admiralty Way, Lekki Phase 1, Lagos
description: Flexible co-working space in Lekki Phase 1 with high-speed internet, meeting rooms, and 24/7 access. Ideal for startups, freelancers, and remote teams.

address: Temporary Yard Space, Badagry Expressway, Lagos
description: Open land space suitable for parking, storage, or temporary industrial use. Secure and accessible location along the busy Badagry Expressway.
